column4: hello, I'm receiving a fatal error when restarting proftpd. It states 'Fatal': group: Unknown group 'nobodyy'. on line 20 of '/etc/proftpd.conf'
on lin 20 in the .conf file, you have the group set to a non-existing group
have you pasted you .conf file yet?
it will take a bit, Im writing a conf for you right quick
have you forwarded the passive port range of 60000-61999 to the ftp server?
you still gotta have the passive ports
where am I forwarding the ports from?
my sysadmin said its a permissions issue w/ my www directory
thats cool, i appreciate what you've done so far...
